memberdef.name: ARG_PARSE_FLOAT
memberdef.initializer: if (i_arg < argc) \ { \ i_arg++; \ x = (float) atof(argv[i_arg]); \ continue; \ } \ else \ { \ fprintf(stderr, "*** error (latt): invalid argument for '%s'\n", \ argv[i_arg-1]); \ exit(INVALID_ARGUMENT_ERROR); \ }

memberdef.name: ARG_PARSE_INT
memberdef.initializer: if (i_arg < argc) \ { \ i_arg++; \ x = atoi(argv[i_arg]); \ continue; \ } \ else \ { \ fprintf(stderr, "*** error (latt): invalid argument for '%s'\n", \ argv[i_arg-1]); \ exit(INVALID_ARGUMENT_ERROR); \ }

memberdef.name: ARG_PARSE_UINT
memberdef.initializer: if (i_arg < argc) \ { \ i_arg++; \ x = (size_t) atoi(argv[i_arg]); \ continue; \ } \ else \ { \ fprintf(stderr, "*** error (latt): invalid argument for '%s'\n", \ argv[i_arg-1]); \ exit(INVALID_ARGUMENT_ERROR); \ }
